name: my own valentine
notes:
treat yourself to some extra love with this small and plush wool scarf. it has a soft texture and an interesting construction with german short rows and a touch of bubbles.
size: 120cm wide, 30cm deep.

yarn: j√§rbo svensk ull 2tr colorway 74104 (100g/300m) held together with rico design luxury alpaca cotton fusion colorway 001 (50g/190m). amount of yarn: ca. 210m of both yarns.

yarn alternatives: sport weight wool yarn  held together with fingering/sport weight fluffy yarn or dk weight wool yarn held together with lace weight fluffy yarn.

update 20/01/26: there was an error in section 5, row 5 of the pattern. this has been corrected and the pattern has been uploaded again.

update 1/2/26: the pattern has been corrected and uploaded again. if you had trouble with the former version, please download the latest version.
